# Packages

```{r load-packages}
library(ggplot2)
library(shiny)
```

# Select Input

```{r select-input}
selectInput(
    inputId='CountrySelection',
    label='Please choose a country',
    choices=list(
        'USA', 'South Africa', 'Ghana', 
        'Brazil', 'Canada', 'Austria'
    )
)
```

```{r print-country}
renderText(
    input$CountrySelection
)
```

# Other Inputs

```{r more-inputs}
sliderInput(
    inputId='SliderSample',
    label='This is a slider',
    min=0, max=10, value=5
)

checkboxInput(
    inputId='CheckSample',
    label='Check this off'
)

radioButtons(
    inputId='Radiohead',
    label='Choose one',
    choices=list('Sad', 'Mellow' ,'Depressing')
)

dateInput(
    inputId='DateChoice',
    label='Select a date'
)

dateRangeInput(
    inputId='DateRangeSample',
    label='Choose a start and end'
)
```

# Text Inputs

```{r text-stuff}
textInput(
    inputId='TextSample',
    label='Write something',
    placeholder='I am a ghost'
)

textAreaInput(
    inputId='BigText',
    label='Write a lot'
)

passwordInput(
    inputId='PasswordSample',
    label='Enter the secret'
)

renderText(input$PasswordSample)
```
